article.title: U.S. Navy Modifies Maritime C3 Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Oceus Networks Incorporated, Reston, Virginia, is being awarded a $7,804,428 contract modification to exercise an option for a rapidly deployable fourth-generation, long-term evolution tactical, wireless, maritime command and control communication solution and support the operational test and evaluation. This modification will provided for the installation of equipment on three ships and in an H-1 rotary wing aircraft for operational test and evaluation. The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
